ygData.subject: Re: New :)
ygData.msgSnippet: Welcome James, (everyone feel free to correct me. :)  ) Casting illusion Ogre will give you the _Base_ faction of an ogre.  My assumption is take that base
ygData.messageBody:
Welcome James,

(everyone feel free to correct me. :) )

Casting illusion Ogre will give you the _Base_ faction of an ogre. My
assumption is take that base faction, and subtract all the faction hits you
took from killing all of those bouncers (dont' forget your religion), and the
ending result will be the _Actual_ faction with the Ogre. If you kill enough
bouncers the illusion won't make a difference. If you are still KOS try
casting alliance/benevolence, to increase faction.

Check out http://eq.castersrealm.com/ the descriptions of the spells there for
enchanters (and any other caster for that matter) are very good. :)

Ezrae
14th Level Dark Elf Enchanter
Brell Serilis


James wrote:

> From: "James" <manickd@...>
>
> Hi I am new to the list.
>
> I just started playing a Enchanter after being tempted to play one for 5 or
> 6 months. Well SO far so good, but I am a little shaky on a few things. Say
> I am KOS in Ogre city as a Dark Elf because I killed 200 bouncer. Then I
> cast Illousion Ogre. Would I still be KOS?
>
>
